## Springer Books Directory


```{r directory}
dir <- "/media/jeksterslib/books/springer"
print(dir)
```


## Available Books

### PDF


```{r pdf}
pdf <- length(
  list.files(
    path = dir,
    pattern = "[[:print:]].pdf"
  )
)
print(pdf)
```


### EPUB


```{r epub}
epub <- length(
  list.files(
    path = dir,
    pattern = "[[:print:]].epub"
  )
)
print(epub)
```


## Download Books


```{r download}
jeksterslabRlib::lib_springer_download(
  dir = dir,
  type = "both",
  par = TRUE,
  ncores = 2
)
```
